mapper.select: select m1.module_code m1_code,m1.module_name m1_name, m1.link_url m1_url, m2.module_code m2_code,m2.module_name m2_name, m2.link_url m2_url, m3.module_code m3_code,m3.module_name m3_name, m3.link_url m3_url from sys_module m1 INNER JOIN sys_module m2 INNER JOIN sys_module m3 on m1.module_code=m2.parent_module and m3.parent_module=m2.module_code where m1.parent_module='01'

select m1.module_code m1_code,m1.module_name m1_name, m1.link_url m1_url, m2.module_code m2_code,m2.module_name m2_name, m2.link_url m2_url, m3.module_code m3_code,m3.module_name m3_name, m3.link_url m3_url from sys_module m1 INNER JOIN sys_module m2 INNER JOIN sys_module m3 on m1.module_code=m2.parent_module and m3.parent_module=m2.module_code where m1.parent_module='01' and m3.module_code in ( select rm.module_id from user_info u INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur INNER JOIN sys_role_fun rm on u.user_id = ur.user_id and ur.role_id=rm.role_id where u.account=#{account} )
select m1.module_code m1_code,m1.module_name m1_name, m1.link_url m1_url from sys_module m1 where m1.parent_module='01'
select m1.module_code m1_code,m1.module_name m1_name, m1.link_url m1_url from sys_module m1
select m1.module_code m1_code,m1.module_name m1_name, m1.link_url m1_url from sys_module m1 where m1.parent_module=#{parentModuleCode}
select m1.module_code m1_code,m1.module_name m1_name, m1.link_url m1_url from sys_module m1 limit #{start},#{limit}

select m1.module_code m1_code,m1.module_name m1_name, m1.link_url m1_url, m2.module_code m2_code,m2.module_name m2_name, m2.link_url m2_url, m3.module_code m3_code,m3.module_name m3_name, m3.link_url m3_url from sys_module m1 INNER JOIN sys_module m2 INNER JOIN sys_module m3 on m1.module_code=m2.parent_module and m3.parent_module=m2.module_code where m1.parent_module='01'
mapper.delete: delete from sys_role_fun where module_id = #{moduleCode} and role_id = #{roleCode}
mapper.select: select module_code from sys_module where parent_module in (select module_code from sys_module where parent_module=#{topid})
select module_code from sys_module where parent_module =#{secondId}
